alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:37PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wright and east central Meeker Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1037 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Dassel, or 18 miles west of Buffalo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Annandale around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Maple Lake and Buffalo. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 181 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Minnesota.
